text:
DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — BMZ Group (DE) e‑Bike LMT 36V‑14Ah (504 Wh) — Full Sample
============================================================================

IMPORTANT NOTE
--------------
This is an illustrative Digital Product Passport (DPP) in plain text for the
BMZ Group (DE) e‑Bike LMT 36V‑14Ah (504 Wh). It is **not** an official manufacturer document. Values marked
'verify' must be confirmed against the official test reports/datasheets/EPREL before
any compliance use.

1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Company: BMZ Group (DE)
Model: e‑Bike LMT 36V‑14Ah (504 Wh)
Category (EU 2023/1542): Light Means of Transport (LMT) battery
Chemistry: Lithium‑ion NMC
Nominal ratings: 36 V, 14 Ah, ~504 Wh
Form factor / Enclosure: Downtube pack
Mass (approx.): ~3.2 kg
GTIN: 03012345678988
Serial number: BMZ-0BB6A96154
Manufacture date: 2025-05-20 (sample)
Batch / Lot: B20250520-89 (sample)
EPREL ID: (enter EPREL ID here)

GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678988/21/BMZ-0BB6A96154

2) MANUFACTURER & CONTACTS
--------------------------
Legal name: BMZ Group (DE) (regional entity)
Website: (enter)
Support email/phone: (enter regional)
Address: (enter HQ/plant)
EU authorised representative: (enter if applicable)

3) REGULATORY, SAFETY & COMPLIANCE (sample statuses)
----------------------------------------------------
Applicable standards/regulations (verify per SKU/market):
• UN 38.3
• IEC 62133‑2 (cells/portable)
• EN 15194 (system level)
Safety notes (summary; not exhaustive):
Use only specified charger; avoid immersion/impact; store cool and partially charged.

4) ELECTRICAL & PERFORMANCE (illustrative; verify)
--------------------------------------------------
Charge window (typical): 0–45 °C; storage 30–50 % SOC
Discharge window (typical): –10 to 60 °C (verify)
Cycle life (example): see warranty criteria; depends on depth‑of‑discharge, temperature, C‑rates
Thermal management: (enter — natural convection / liquid loop / forced air)
Communication interfaces: CAN / proprietary; charger 42 V CC/CV
Protection features: OVP/UVP/OCP/OTP; insulation monitoring (if applicable)

5) MATERIALS & CRITICAL RAW MATERIALS
-------------------------------------
Cells: (enter format e.g., prismatic/pouch/cylindrical); separator: polyolefin
Cathode/anode: (enter blend; e.g., NMC with high‑Ni; graphite/anode blend for Li‑ion)
Electrolyte: LiPF6 in organic carbonate (Li‑ion) / acid for lead‑acid
Critical raw materials: Lithium, Nickel, Cobalt, Graphite (Li‑ion); Lead (lead‑acid)
Packaging: Aluminium/steel housing; connectors and harness per design

6) SOFTWARE, CONNECTIVITY & CYBERSECURITY
-----------------------------------------
BMS update policy: security updates during product lifecycle (define duration)
Interfaces: CAN/Modbus/SMBus (as specified); SOC/SOH reporting; fault logs
Data: privacy and retention policies to be defined per contract

7) MAINTENANCE, REPAIR & SPARE PARTS
------------------------------------
Routine maintenance:
• Keep firmware/BMS updated; maintain connectors and cooling paths
• Storage: 30–50 % SOC; 10–25 °C; check every 3–6 months
Serviceability: Module replacement possible (design dependent); cell replacement by OEM only
Spare parts availability target: 5–10 years (define contractually)

8) INSTALLATION & COMMISSIONING
-------------------------------
• Verify polarity and torque specs; ensure correct BMS commissioning
• Observe creepage/clearance; isolation test per standard
• Integrate with charger/inverter meeting applicable standards

9) TRANSPORT & HAZMAT
---------------------
UN number: UN 3480 (Li‑ion) / UN 3481 (with equipment) / UN 2794 (lead‑acid) / UN 2800 (non‑spillable)
ADR/IATA/IMDG packaging: per test summary and packing instructions (e.g., P903, 965–970)
Transport SOC: typically ≤30 %; pack in approved packaging; apply Class 9 labels

10) END‑OF‑LIFE (EoL) & CIRCULARITY
-----------------------------------
• Producer responsibility (EPR): return through authorized schemes or contract take‑back
• Diagnosis: assess SOH for 2nd‑life vs direct recycling
• Recycling: recover Al/Cu/Fe; process black mass hydrometallurgically (Li‑ion) or closed‑loop lead

11) ENVIRONMENTAL FOOTPRINT (illustrative)
------------------------------------------
Cradle‑to‑gate carbon footprint: (enter value and method, e.g., 70–120 kg CO₂e/kWh for Li‑ion; run LCA/EPD)
Use‑phase note: charge/discharge efficiency and grid intensity drive impacts
Packaging: recyclable corrugated; avoid unnecessary plastics

12) WARRANTY (example; enter your terms)
----------------------------------------
2 years to ≥60–70 % capacity (example)

13) TRACEABILITY & DATA CARRIER
-------------------------------
GS1 keys: GTIN 03012345678988, Serial BMZ-0BB6A96154, Lot B20250520-89
Digital Link (QR/NFC): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678988/21/BMZ-0BB6A96154
Data fields: manufacturing date, plant, batch, chemistry, recycling info

14) LINKED DOCUMENTATION (insert your URLs or files)
----------------------------------------------------
• Test summary UN 38.3 (PDF): (enter)
• IEC/EN certificates (PDF): (enter)
• Safety information & SDS: (enter)
• Installation/Use manual: (enter)
• Recycling/take‑back info: (enter)

15) GOVERNANCE & VERSIONING
---------------------------
DPP issuer: Example DPP Generator (sample)
Version: 1.1
Created: 2025-09-01
Last updated: 2025-09-01
Data quality: Public sources + placeholders — replace 'verify' with official values.
Notes: Adapt to EU Battery Regulation (EU) 2023/1542 & delegated acts on DPP content.

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — LMT (e‑bike) Battery (Near‑real)
============================================================================
Company: BMZ Group (DE)
Model: e‑Bike LMT 36V‑14Ah (downtube) (sample)
Chemistry: Lithium‑ion (NMC) with BMS
Category (EU 2023/1542): Light Means of Transport (LMT) battery

RATINGS
-------
Nominal voltage: 36 V   Capacity: 14 Ah   Energy: 504 Wh
Max continuous discharge: 20–25 A (example)   Charger: 42 V CC/CV

IDENTIFICATION & TRACEABILITY
-----------------------------
GTIN: 03012345678933
Serial: BMZ-LMT-36V14-4334473DCF
EPREL ID: EPREL-BATT-BMZ-0004
Manufacture date: 2025-04-12
Batch/Lot: LMT-20250412-04
GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678933/21/BMZ-LMT-36V14-4334473DCF

COMPLIANCE (VERIFY REGION)
--------------------------
• UN 38.3 — transport test
• EN 15194 (EPAC systems) — system level; IEC 62133‑2 for portable Li‑ion safety
• IEC 60335‑2‑29 (charger safety) — charger
• Markings: separate collection symbol; capacity/Wh; QR to safety/info

SAFETY
------
• BMS protections: OVP/UVP/OCP/OTP; storage 30–50 % SOC; charge 0–45 °C; use only specified charger
• Transport: UN 3480 (or UN 3481 if shipped with bicycle)

END‑OF‑LIFE
-----------
• Return via retailer/EPR scheme; battery disassembly only by trained technicians

WARRANTY (EXAMPLE)
------------------
• 2 years to ≥60–70 % capacity (cycles & terms region dependent)

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Electric Vehicle Battery (Near‑real)
============================================================================
Company: Northvolt (SE)
Model: EV traction pack 400 V—55 kWh (sample)
Chemistry: Lithium‑ion NMC (nickel‑manganese‑cobalt), liquid‑cooled
Category (EU 2023/1542): Electric vehicle battery (>2 kWh)

ELECTRICAL & MECHANICAL (TYP. VALUES)
-------------------------------------
Nominal voltage: 400 V   Energy: 55 kWh   Peak power: 170 kW (10 s) (example)
Cooling: Liquid glycol loop; integrated HV contactors and pyrofuse
Communication: CAN FD   Isolation monitoring: integrated
Mass (approx.): 350 kg   Enclosure: IP67 (pack), IP6K9K optional

IDENTIFICATION & TRACEABILITY
-----------------------------
GTIN: 03012345678919
Serial: NVLT-EVP-400-55-74DC0BC979
EPREL ID: EPREL-BATT-NV-0002
Manufacture date: 2025-06-15
Batch/Lot: EVP-20250615-02
GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678919/21/NVLT-EVP-400-55-74DC0BC979

COMPLIANCE (VERIFY PER OEM VARIANT)
-----------------------------------
• UN 38.3 (cells/modules/pack) — compliant (reference lab report)
• UNECE R100 (electric powertrain safety) — compliant via vehicle type approval
• UNECE R10 (EMC) — as part of vehicle E‑marking
• ISO 26262 functional safety — applied at ASIL C/D for BMS controls
• IEC 62660 series (cells) / IEC 62619 (modules) — as applicable

SAFETY & HAZARD MITIGATION
--------------------------
• Venting paths and TPRDs where applicable; HVIL present
• Passive propagation resistance features between modules (design‑dependent)
• Thermal runaway detection: cell/module temperature, ΔT/ΔV patterns

MATERIALS & CRITICAL RAW MATERIALS (indicative)
-----------------------------------------------
Cathode: Ni‑Mn‑Co; Anode: Graphite (blend)   Electrolyte: LiPF6 in organic solvent
Critical raw materials: Lithium, Cobalt, Nickel, Graphite
Pack recyclability: Al/Cu/Fe recovery; black mass to hydrometallurgical refining

CARBON FOOTPRINT (placeholder)
------------------------------
Manufacturing footprint: e.g., 70–100 kg CO₂e/kWh if powered by low‑carbon electricity — replace with OEM value

END‑OF‑LIFE
-----------
• Managed via OEM/producer take‑back; state‑of‑health measured before repurpose/recycle
• UN 3480 for logistics; SOC ≤30 %, use EV‑battery transport packaging

WARRANTY (EXAMPLE)
------------------
• 8 years / 160,000 km to ≥70–80 % capacity; exact terms per vehicle OEM

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Industrial Battery (Near‑real)
============================================================================
Company: Saft (FR)
Model: Flex’ion‑style 48V‑100Ah LFP module (sample)
Chemistry: Lithium iron phosphate (LFP), prismatic cells
Category (EU 2023/1542): Industrial battery (>2 kWh)
Rated voltage / capacity / energy: 51.2 V nominal / 100 Ah / 5120 Wh
Mass (approx.): 45 kg   Form factor: 19″ rack, ~3U

IDENTIFICATION & TRACEABILITY
-----------------------------
GTIN: 03012345678902
Serial: SAFT-FXM-48V100-7139A255D9
EPREL ID: EPREL-BATT-SFT-0001
Manufacture date: 2025-07-10
Batch/Lot: FXM-20250710-01
GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678902/21/SAFT-FXM-48V100-7139A255D9

MANUFACTURER (SUMMARY)
----------------------
Saft (TotalEnergies) — Headquarters: Levallois‑Perret, FR. Regional service via local partners.

COMPLIANCE (VERIFY FOR YOUR SKU)
--------------------------------
• UN 38.3 transportation testing (cells & battery pack): compliant (declare test report ref)
• IEC 62619 (industrial Li‑ion safety): compliant (declare CB report ref)
• CE/EMC (pack with BMS): EN 61000 series (as applicable)
• RoHS/REACH declarations available on request
• Markings: Separate collection symbol; DoC link via QR/GS1

BMS & INTERFACES
----------------
• BMS protections: OVP/UVP/OCP/OTP/charging temp window, passive balancing
• Comms: CANopen / Modbus RTU (selectable); dry contact alarms
• Parallel/series: up to 8 in parallel (verify cabinet spec)

SAFETY & TRANSPORT
------------------
UN number: UN 3480 (Lithium‑ion batteries)
Packaging: P903 (ADR) or equivalent   State of charge for transport: ≤30 % SOC
Fire response: Class D agents not effective; use copious water for cooling per local guidance

ENVIRONMENT & MATERIALS (indicative)
------------------------------------
Recycled content: aluminium/copper fractions depend on supplier (declare if known)
Critical raw materials: Lithium, Graphite (anode), Phosphate/iron   Cobalt/Nickel: none (LFP)
Carbon footprint (cradle‑to‑gate, placeholder): ~120 kg CO₂e per kWh (replace with EPD/CFP)

END‑OF‑LIFE
-----------
• Return through producer responsibility scheme (EPR) or contractual take‑back
• Discharge below 30 %; remove to certified recycler; recover Cu/Al/Fe; treat electrolyte safely

WARRANTY & SERVICE (EXAMPLE)
----------------------------
• 5 years or 6,000 cycles @ 80 % EoL (whichever first), with operating window 10–90 % SOC
• Keep firmware/BMS updated; log files available via service port

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — SLI Lead‑acid Battery (Near‑real)
============================================================================
Company: VARTA (DE)
Model: AGM SLI 12V‑95Ah (non‑spillable) (sample)
Chemistry: Lead‑acid AGM (absorbent glass mat), valve‑regulated
Category (EU 2023/1542): SLI (starting, lighting, ignition)

RATINGS (EXAMPLE)
-----------------
Nominal voltage: 12 V   Capacity: 95 Ah (20 h)   Energy: ~1140 Wh
Cold cranking current (CCA): 850–950 A (EN) (model dependent)
Non‑spillable design; vibration‑resistant; stop‑start compatible

IDENTIFICATION & TRACEABILITY
-----------------------------
GTIN: 03012345678926
Serial: VARTA-AGM-12V95-95CCCFF336
EPREL ID: EPREL-BATT-VRT-0003
Manufacture date: 2025-05-20
Batch/Lot: SLI-20250520-03
GS1 Digital Link (example): https://id.gs1.org/01/03012345678926/21/VARTA-AGM-12V95-95CCCFF336

COMPLIANCE / STANDARDS
----------------------
• EN 50342 series (automotive lead‑acid — performance & endurance)
• UN number: UN 2800 (Batteries, wet, non‑spillable)
• Markings: Pb symbol; separate collection; recycling info label
• REACH: SVHC disclosure for lead; safety data sheet available

SAFETY & HANDLING
-----------------
• Do not tip; keep vents unobstructed; avoid sparks/open flame
• Charging: follow vehicle/regulator specs; avoid over‑charge/over‑discharge

END‑OF‑LIFE
-----------
• Return deposit/refund scheme where applicable; recycle with authorized facility (lead loop)
• High recyclability (>95 % of lead by mass typically recovered)

WARRANTY (EXAMPLE)
------------------
• 3 years passenger cars (region dependent)

— END OF DOCUMENT —

--------------------------------------------------

Electrolyte: LiPF6 in organic carbonate (Li‑ion) / acid for lead‑acid

------------------------------------
Routine maintenance:
• Keep firmware/BMS updated; maintain connectors and cooling paths
• Storage: 30–50 % SOC; 10–25 °C; check every 3–6 months
Serviceability: Module replacement possible (design dependent); cell replacement by OEM only
Spare parts availability target: 5–10 years (define contractually)

-------------------------------
• Verify polarity and torque specs; ensure correct BMS commissioning
• Observe creepage/clearance; isolation test per standard
• Integrate with charger/inverter meeting applicable standards

9) TRANSPORT & HAZMAT
---------------------
UN number: UN 3480 (Li‑ion) / UN 3481 (with equipment) / UN 2794 (lead‑acid) / UN 2800 (non‑spillable)
ADR/IATA/IMDG packaging: per test summary and packing instructions (e.g., P903, 965–970)
Transport SOC: typically ≤30 %; pack in approved packaging; apply Class 9 labels

10) END‑OF‑LIFE (EoL) & CIRCULARITY
-----------------------------------
• Producer responsibility (EPR): return through authorized schemes or contract take‑back
• Diagnosis: assess SOH for 2nd‑life vs direct recycling
• Recycling: recover Al/Cu/Fe; process black mass hydrometallurgically (Li‑ion) or closed‑loop lead

Use‑phase note: charge/discharge efficiency and grid intensity drive impacts
